issue.title: A security Bug.

repository.name: jackson-databind
repository.description: General data-binding package for Jackson (2.x): works on streaming API (core) implementation(s)

issue.body:
Hello, buddy. I found a JRE dependent gadget that can be used for SSRF when deserializing.

I have sent an email to info@fasterxml.com for details of the vulnerability.

Thanks.

rename.to: Block one more gadget type (javax.swing, CVE-2020-xxx)

issue.title: merge CVE from 2.9 branch(ad5a63017)

repository.name: jackson-databind
repository.description: General data-binding package for Jackson (2.x): works on streaming API (core) implementation(s)

issue.body:
ref PR: #2653 #2658 #2659 #2660 #2662 #2664 #2666 #2670 #2680 #2682 #2688 #2698 #2704 #2765 #2798 #2814 #2826 #2827 #2854

This PR by:

1. generated diff CVE diff
git diff ad5a63017 -- src/main/java/com/fasterxml/jackson/databind/jsontype/impl/SubTypeValidator.java

2. cleanup the diff ,just remain the CVE change

3. apply the diff

4. check and make sure only commit the AutoType CVE change.

```
PR_LIST=$(git log1 -n 17 ad5a63017 -- src/main/java/com/fasterxml/jackson/databind/jsontype/impl/SubTypeValidator.java | awk -F'[ ,]+' '{for(i=1;i<=NF;i++){a=$(i);if(match(a,/#[0-9]+/)){print a;}}}' | sort | uniq);echo "$PR_LIST" | wc -l
echo $PR_LIST
```

issue.title: CVE-2021-20190 (High) detected in jackson-databind-2.8.8.jar

repository.name: flowgate
repository.description: Facility systems integrate with IT stack in data centers

issue.body:
## CVE-2021-20190 - High Severity Vulnerability
Vulnerable Library - jackson-databind-2.8.8.jar

General data-binding functionality for Jackson: works on core streaming API

Library home page: http://fasterxml.com/

Path to dependency file: /operation-expert/pom.xml

Path to vulnerable library: /home/wss-scanner/.m2/repository/com/fasterxml/jackson/core/jackson-databind/2.8.8/jackson-databind-2.8.8.jar

Dependency Hierarchy: - spring-boot-starter-hateoas-1.4.7.RELEASE.jar (Root Library) - spring-boot-starter-web-1.4.7.RELEASE.jar - :x: **jackson-databind-2.8.8.jar** (Vulnerable Library)

Found in HEAD commit: dd01a1d4381c7a3b94ba25748c015a094c33088e

Found in base branch: master

Vulnerability Details

A flaw was found in jackson-databind before 2.9.10.7. FasterXML mishandles the interaction between serialization gadgets and typing. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality and integrity as well as system availability.

Publish Date: 2021-01-19

URL: CVE-2021-20190

CVSS 3 Score Details (8.1)

Base Score Metrics: - Exploitability Metrics: - Attack Vector: Network - Attack Complexity: High - Privileges Required: None - User Interaction: None - Scope: Unchanged - Impact Metrics: - Confidentiality Impact: High - Integrity Impact: High - Availability Impact: High

For more information on CVSS3 Scores, click here.

Suggested Fix

Type: Upgrade version

Release Date: 2021-01-19

Fix Resolution (com.fasterxml.jackson.core:jackson-databind): 2.9.10.7

Direct dependency fix Resolution (org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-starter-hateoas): 2.2.0.RELEASE

*** :rescue_worker_helmet: Automatic Remediation will be attempted for this issue.
